name: dataapp-developer
description: Specialized toolkit for building Streamlit data apps for Keboola deployment with validate → build → verify workflow

playwright.description: Playwright MCP server for browser automation and visual testing. Enables screenshot capture, UI interaction testing, and visual verification of Streamlit apps.

metadata.setupInstructions: No additional configuration needed. Server will install browser dependencies on first use. Use 'mcp__playwright__browser_install' if prompted to install browser.
